name: Shellshocked
description:
Controls

WS - Thrust

AD - Rotate

Space - Drill

Z - Ping

A wormhole malfunction leaves you stranded in an unfamiliar solar system. Luckily the asteroid belt is abundant in exotic matter. Collect enough of it before the wormhole closes completely and you might make it out alive. Just don't lose your only drone; who knows what might lurk inside the asteroids. 

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 39.
